alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 10:09PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Taney, southeastern Christian and southeastern Stone Counties through 1100 PM CST... At 1009 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Branson West to near Indian Point to 6 miles west of Roberson Hollow. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Table Rock Lake, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Kissee Mills, Rockaway Beach, Bull Creek, Indian Point, Branson West, Taneyville, Table Rock, Kirbyville, Blue Eye, Powersite and Keltner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
